item.title: Learning How to Learn in Learning Machine Learning
item.description: The Learning How to Learn Course Learning-how-to-learn is a free Coursera course that teaches about how the brain uses two very different learning modes and how it encapsulates (“chunks”) information. It also covers illusions of learning, memory techniques, dealing with procrastination, and best practices shown by research to be most effective in helping you master tough subjects. I first knew about this course when I was trying to create my own learning path for learning machine learning.
